settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We accept returns within 14 days of delivery for unused, unopened products. See our Refund & Returns Policy for details.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Currently we ship within India. International shipping may be available soon.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Free shipping is available on orders above ₹999.
